cleaned_text: Place these crystals in your home or office and prepare for an overflow of positive energy. Healing Crystals have been carefully selected to complement a specific room based on their qualities and characteristics. Each crystal provides your space with an infusion of self-love, creativity, clarity, and peace. Allow these genuine crystals to revitalize your home's energy and those who fill it. Amethyst: Purifies the mind; aids in the clearing of negativity by instilling calm and clear thoughts. Clear Quartz: Regulates energy; aids in contraption while cleansing and revitalizing your body, bringing it into balance. Labradorite: Aids in removing bad habits, negative thoughts and feelings; awakens your intuition and inner spirit while strengthening from within. Rose Quartz: Carries a soft energy of compassion, peace, and healing; useful for attracting not only romantic love, but unconditional self-love into your life.
